function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disruptions in production due to decreasing availability of essential raw materials and staff","Impact":"Reduced production capacity and potential shortages of essential products","Mitigation":"Implement diversification of supply sources and workforce flexibility","Technologies":"Supply chain management software for real-time tracking and decision-making","People":"Production staff, logistics workers","Owner":"Supply chain managers, production managers"},{"Description":"Changes in demand patterns leading to disruptions in distribution and SCM","Impact":"Imbalances in supply and demand, potential stockpiling and hoarding","Mitigation":"Forecasting and demand planning, implementing inventory optimization strategies","Technologies":"Demand forecasting software, inventory management systems","People":"Supply chain managers, logistics personnel","Owner":"Retailers, distribution companies"},{"Description":"Lack of agility and adaptability in traditional companies with products or demand that do not change continuously","Impact":"Inability to respond to sudden changes in market demand and distribution challenges","Mitigation":"Invest in agile supply chain practices, collaborate with technology partners for digital transformation","Technologies":"Agile supply chain solutions, digital supply chain platforms","People":"Traditional companies, supply chain managers","Owner":"Company leadership and management"}]}
